name: Hook Fishes - Get Money
description:
Description

In this 2D fishing simulator, your goal is to go out to sea every day and pick up some fish. Luckily your local fishing shop is constantly looking to buy fish from you. They are also kind enough to sell upgrades for your boat so that you can catch more expensive fish, as well as protect yourself from the sharks that infest your sea.

Try and make the most amount of net profit, and survive for as long as you can!

Controls

A/D (or Left and Right Arrow) - Left and Right movement

Mouse - Move the hook

Left-click - Attempt to catch a fish

Goals

Collect as many fish you can during the day, so that when you go to the market, you have the opportunity to make more money. You can then use the money you make at the market to buy upgrades for your boat. Whether it be a longer fishing line to catch some deep fish, or it be some extra defenses to fight against the aggressive sharks.

Changelog V1.1:

3 things were changed. -First: you can now click on a fish without having to have your mouse move off of it, making it easier to catch a fish.

-Second: After the bucket upgrade to hold 200 pounds, each upgrade increases by 20 pounds instead of 10, making the difficulty of upgrading better late game.

-Third: the upgrades panel now explicitly states that the chance of catching a fish also increases when you upgrade the hook, instead of it just stating that it upgrades the amount of fish it can hold.

END V1.1
